dt: {bc}the ability to think clearly and act quickly in an emergency

dt: {bc}the rear part of the human body from the neck to the end of the spine {bc}the upper part of the body of an animal
{bc}the part of something that is opposite or away from the front part
{bc}a player in a team game who plays behind the forward line of players

the part of something that is opposite or away from the front part
a player in a team game who plays behind the forward line of players

dt: {bc}to move while holding up and supporting {bc}{sx|carry||}
{bc}to have as a feature or characteristic

dt.t: She {it}bears{/it} a resemblance to her sister.

dt: {bc}to move or lie in the indicated direction
{bc}to have a relation to the matter at hand

dt.t: These facts don't {it}bear{/it} on the question.

dt: {bc}to think of especially as a warning

dt.t: {it}Bear in mind{/it} that you only get one chance.

shortdef: support
to move while holding up and supporting : carry
to hold in the mind

dt: {bc}to move or be moved usually with speed and force
{bc}to move in or with the wind
{bc}to send forth a strong stream of air from the mouth or from a bellows

dt.t: If you are cold, {it}blow{/it} on your hands.

dt: {bc}to make a sound or cause to sound by blowing

dt.t: The workers showed how they {it}blow{/it} glass.

shortdef: to move or be moved usually with speed and force
to move in or with the wind
to send forth a strong stream of air from the mouth or from a bellows

dt: {bc}to cause to come by carrying or leading {bc}take along
{bc}to cause to reach a certain state or take a certain action

dt.t: I couldn't {it}bring{/it} myself to say it.

dt: {bc}to cause to return to a person's memory

dt.t: Seeing him {it}brought{/it} it all {it}back{/it} to me.
The manufacturer {it}brought out{/it} a new model.
His friends {it}bring out{/it} the best in him.

dt: {bc}to bring to maturity through care and education

shortdef: to cause to come by carrying or leading : take along
to cause to reach a certain state or take a certain action
to cause to arrive or exist

dt: {bc}to speak in a loud clear voice so as to be heard at a distance {bc}{sx|shout||}
{bc}to tell, order, or ask to come
{bc}to get in touch with by telephone
{bc}to regard as being of a certain kind
{bc}to say or guess what the result will be

dt.t: The election is too close to {it}call{/it}.
The game was {it}called{/it} on account of rain.

dt: {bc}to cause or tell to stop attacking or chasing

dt.t: Nokomis snored and often talked in her sleep, {it}calling out{/it} to people from long ago.

dt: {bc}to order (a group of people) to come or go somewhere
{bc}to cause to be thought of or remembered

shortdef: to speak in a loud clear voice so as to be heard at a distance : shout
to announce or read (something) loudly
to tell, order, or ask to come

dt: {bc}to move, pass, or extend across or past

dt.t: Look both ways before you {it}cross{/it} the street.
She's tough, and I wouldn't dare to {it}cross{/it} her.

dt: {bc}to cause (an animal or plant) to breed with one of another kind {bc}produce hybrids

dt.t: You can {it}cross{/it} my name {it}off{/it} the list.

dt: {bc}to draw a line through (something) to show that it is wrong
{bc}to touch the forehead, chest, and shoulders as an expression of Christian faith (as in prayer)

shortdef: to move, pass, or extend across or past
to place one over the other
to lie or be situated across
